text: Luke Robert Ravenstahl (born February 6, 1980) is an American politician. He was the 59th Mayor of Pittsburgh from 2006 until 2014. A Democrat, he became the youngest mayor in Pittsburgh's history in September 2006 at the age of 26. He was among the youngest mayors of a major city in American history. ==References== ==Other websites== * "Baby-Faced Mayor Takes Over an Aging Pittsburgh", The New York Times article, September 9, 2006 *Luke For Mayor, Ravenstahl's reelection site *CityMayors profile Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Pittsburgh Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
